tablab 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Create a variable & value label dataframe

    tab_labs.Rd

    Create a variable & value label dataframe

    tab_labs(df, rm_non_labelled = FALSE)

    Arguments

    df

    Labelled dataframe, e.g., resulting of the read_sav / read_dta functions of the package haven.

    rm_non_labelled

    Logical indicating whether the result should contain non-labelled variables (neither variable nor value labels).

    Value

    Dataframe consisting of 4 columns var, varlab, val and vallab, showing all variable & value labels in df.

    Examples

    # load spss data
path <- system.file("examples", "iris.sav", package = "haven")
df <- haven::read_sav(path)
tab_labs(df)
#> No variable in the data.frame has a variable label
#> # A tibble: 7 × 5
#>   var          varlab    nv vallab     cv   
#>   <chr>        <chr>  <dbl> <chr>      <chr>
#> 1 Sepal.Length NA        NA NA         NA   
#> 2 Sepal.Width  NA        NA NA         NA   
#> 3 Petal.Length NA        NA NA         NA   
#> 4 Petal.Width  NA        NA NA         NA   
#> 5 Species      NA         1 setosa     NA   
#> 6 Species      NA         2 versicolor NA   
#> 7 Species      NA         3 virginica  NA
